website_summaries.verdict: This early-model eufy vacuum is still one of its best for the price, with multiple side brushes for thorough cleaning and a low-profile design for getting underneath tables and chairs.
pros: The 3-point cleaning system includes a rolling brush and 2 side brushes, so this model is unlikely to miss even hard to reach spots
The remote allows users to control the multiple cleaning modes at the touch of a button
This self-charging unit returns to its base when the battery is low
cons: This unit is designed for hardwood or low-pile carpets, and may not work as well on thicker carpets

customer_reviews.title: #1 robot vac for value - keep it under the bed :]
customer_reviews.text: Love this robot vacume so far, 1 week in. Works great and picks up all the dirt in the room daily. I will be buying another when they go on sale as a gift. I highly recommend this product as a reasonably priced robot vacume. Battery lasts longer than advertised. Picks up that stuffy dust n dirt! All food from dinner and hair balls and small objects. Make sure you have a clear path for Eufy to patrol at night. Tidy up a few things, pick up chairs, make sure wires are tucked away!!! And you get a spotless clean floor every morning you wake up!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Cent
customer_reviews.text: We love our Eufy! This is a great little machine that helps enormously with the pet hair around our apartment. It seems to navigate the twists and turns in our small apartment with no problems. I've even had a friend comment that she was really impressed because it is much quieter than her name brand vacuum bot.
customer_reviews.author: Dre Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Stops working and warranty not honored.
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved my eufy, but suddenly it started turning circles after a few months and I could not get it to work properly. I emailed the company and they did not respond. I bought another one and now this one has stopped working after a month. Waiting for a response. I bought one for my cousin and was going to get one for my daughter, but now I just want them to take everything back. I am heartily disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen P. Devine

customer_reviews.title: Not work on our mixed rug and laminate floors
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you have a mixture of rugs and laminate floors. Both the original and replacement stopped several times per hour, either while on or just getting off a rug. Beeped an error message of jammed wheel. The wheel was not jammed - it started right up with the remote control. Our multicolored rugs are approximately 1/2" in height. Then we bought a Rhumba 652 - which works great ------------------- Update Nov 5, 2017 - newer model might work OK Company is launching a new model which is supposed to operate on rugs RoboVac 11+ with Power Boost: mid-pile up to 22mm tall and 17mm fiber length
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lahore

customer_reviews.title: Great vac
customer_reviews.text: I had this for 2 years before replacing with a newer model (due to me breaking an internal part). The battery did have to be replaced once. It ran strong and took beatings. Unfortunately it was at a height that made it get stuck when trying to go under my bed. I don't fault the vac for this though. It picked up dog hair and a good amount of dirt on both hardwood, tile and carpet. It transitioned between them fine as well. It wasn't the smartest at finding its way back home and I would often need to assist. Regular cleaning and maintenance made for a great vac. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: stvo

customer_reviews.title: ... had this for less than a year and a good two months of that it was in storage
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for less than a year and a good two months of that it was in storage. The vacuum will eat any cord it gets near which is incredibly frustrating. It gets stuck under the refrigerator which seems to be one of its favorite places to go. There is no rhyme or reason to its pattern and it skips entire sections of the room. It also doesn’t pick up everything, or even close to that. There is always a lot left behind which defeats the purpose of this vacuum. You also need to make sure there is nothing on your floors or the vacuum will knock it over or vacuum it up.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Bad luck or bad product?
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine since March 2017 and have already needed a second replacement Eufy. When it works, IT WORKS! I have 2 cats in an 800 sq. ft condo and it keeps my hard wood floors really hair/dust free and saves me a ton of time. The down side is obviously having to replace it 2x in less than a year is incredibly frustrating. The 1 year warranty saves you, and their customer service is superb. Not sure if I just have bad luck, or a crappy product. But the 2,600+ 4.5 star reviews are a reflection of the product. This video shows it just spinning in circles until it "errors out."
customer_reviews.author: It'sMe

customer_reviews.title: Works well initially, but unreliable. However, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had to replace this vacuum three times. Each time it seems to work for a few months and then something or another causes it to malfunction. I’m particular about keeping my tech and belongings in good shape and following whatever instructions come with it, but despite frequently cleaning it and such, it simply kept having issues. To be clear though, it still works, but it will give random error beeps and stop in the middle of a cleaning cycle despite the unit being clean and the area being obstruction free. For all the unit's issues, the customer support at Eufy is absolutely phenomenal
customer_reviews.author: Neaaz

customer_reviews.title: Dead..15 Days After Warranty Ends, No Help.
customer_reviews.text: Mine died before the warranty period ended. Now, it's15 days past my warranty and they won't even consider helping me at all. Not a discount on a refurbished one. But, they did say I can pay for a new one and may be able to receive a $20 credit after the fact. Not impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Parker

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: Amazing robot. Very smart and effective. My place is all carpet floored and i was shocked with the difference in its efficacy to compare with my real good vacuum cleaner. Very easy to set up and manipulate. Love the auto option i set its alarm for a daily quick clean up, it literally hits all the rooms. Can be driven with the remote as well!! I use that whenever a small section gets soiled. Most importanly it is surface and object friendly i let it even bump into electronics. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: JoelleW

customer_reviews.title: I am so upset with this machine now and it's total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I used it less then 10 times now. It stops running every few minutes in the middle of the room for no reason. Not out of juice, not stuck in anything, just decided to stop working. Can I return it? I am so upset with this machine now and it's total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The love of my life!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had Gary for almost a year now. I use him on about 800 square feet of hardwood floors and I have two dogs. He cleans the whole area every time I set him going. He always puts himself to bed when his battery is low. He does get caught up on the transition into the bathroom, but it’s quite high so I wouldn’t expect him to make it. Other than that, I have had zero issues. I seriously love this thing so much! (Photo: One time he brought a sock back to bed with him :)
customer_reviews.author: Alphabet

customer_reviews.title: 5-stars quality and customer support!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this since June 2017 and it been amazing. I have kept up on emptying it out and cleaning the filter and it keeps my carpet in tip-top shape. I recently had an issue where it continued to only move backwards because of an issue with the front bumper sensor. I wrote to Eufy and they assured me they would help me resolve the issue and offered a few troubleshooting tips. I ended up fixing the problem by using the included brush tool to clean out the opening between the main body of the unit and the front bumper. So Eufy is back to taking care of business and I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Wife likes it
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Wife likes it. But the comments are true about it not seeming very "smart" in its coverage. Seems very random, so I knocked one star off for this. But as far as what it's sucking up, its doing a great job. I think its a perfect choice for an "intro" vac, to see if you like the whole concept. Now that I have this one, I am considering buying a more sophisticated model for one floor, and leaving this one on the "easier" floor.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended for pet hair problems
customer_reviews.text: received the package and had the robot running in 10 minutes. works great, I am very impressed, especially since my first robot vacuum cleaner (made by another company) didn't work at all. this thing is quiet, has great obstruction avoidance, goes over small floor changes easily and sweeps great! I'll update this after a couple weeks of use but if keeps on doing what its doing, I'll be one happy camper. we hadn't had a dog in several years and after 8 months of having to vacuum up dog hair all the time (plus dirt dragged in) decided to try robotic vacuuming. I'm hooked and this thing works great!
customer_reviews.author: M. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Love this guy!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of the first roombas and it had the smallest dust chamber. I have two dogs and this vacuum does the best job ever! It has a large dust chamber and I'm amazed at how much dirt this thing picks up. I run it 3xs a day and it barely needs a charge. It gets stuck sometimes, but it's not a bother. He will beep at you to come rescue him. I would highly recommend the product to anyone who has wood or tile floors and throw rugs that don't have tassels or stray threads as he will suck them right up and then he will jam. I've named him Willie, the grounds keeper from The Simpsons...
customer_reviews.author: Julia Dorsett

customer_reviews.title: Husky Owner
customer_reviews.text: Yes...you can have pets that shed...cats, golden retrievers....whatever. But you don't REALLY know shedding until you own a husky. No matter how often you vacuum, you WILL have tumbleweeds of dog hair in your house...unless you have a Eufy RoboVac 11 ;) This thing is legit life changing. I turn it on at night before I go to bed and wake up to a spotless floor with it back at its charging station. I'm not exaggerating when i say this thing vacuums better than my standalone hand push vacuum either. Definetly a great buy. And with Amazon's 6 mo financing deal...this thing only cost $37/mo. There is literally no reason for you not to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Works well....BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I really like my Eufy. It does a marvelous job on our tile floors. It navigates spectacularly around furniture and pets (cat & dog). My dog just sits there and makes it go around him...lol. My one complaint is in regard to it's "collection basket." If there is a difference in elevation such as entering or leaving a carpeted area, the "bump" caused the vacuum to dump it's cargo. This is unsightly to say the least, however, the rest of the floor looks great. So now instead of having to vacuum the entire house myself, I just have to check the edges of the carpet ;)
customer_reviews.author: ireadtoomuch

customer_reviews.title: Makes Life Easier
customer_reviews.text: This is the third robot vacuum we've tried, and it blows the other ones out of the water. It seems smarter and cleans so much better. We have four (yes, four!) cats and one toddler. Between cat fur and crumbs, I was vacuuming every two days to be able to walk barefoot in my own living room. This thing sucks up so much JUNK. It works amazing on our wood floors, and does a decent job on our area rug. We've had it a month, and we haven't taken out our hand held vacuum yet. This has freed up so much time from vacuuming with the hand held! I love it 😊
customer_reviews.author: M. Ashton

customer_reviews.title: It actually gets the floor clean.
customer_reviews.text: What I love the most is that it is so smart. It figured out the configuration of my living room, dining room and kitchen and hall and then cleaned everything. My floors are all tile with one area rug and it cleaned that too. Anyone with hard floors needs this. Try as I might I can't come up with anything I like least about it. Even the price was good compared to some of the other brands. Also the robot is very sleek and good looking. It's pretty nice to sit on the couch while the little robot is doing all the work.
customer_reviews.author: Beepee

customer_reviews.title: Caveat Emptor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in may of 2017 and it broke down and did not work anymore 5 mos later. I contacted their customer service and was given instructions on how to reboot the unit and it worked for Approx 3’more weeks. I contacted them again and asked for A new unit or a refund. They will no longer reply to me. AT ALL. In short this machine is cheaply built and does NOT last. Read some other reviews and you will see my review is NOT the only one like this. The positive reviews you read are NEW buyers and buyers should BEWARE when considering buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: D S

customer_reviews.title: Far superior to earlier robovacs, and a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for 2 months and has worked super well, keeping up with dog and cat. Our dog sheds like crazy this time of year, and it's amazing how much there is to clean. We are not using all of the programming. It's easier just to put it in a room and let it do it's work. We have had it going around more than one room, but it's a little more hit-or-miss. Still...very pleased. Filters and other items have been on back order, but when I contacted customer service, they promised (and did) let me know when items were again available to order on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: you are better off just vacuuming yourself
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with rugs at all. Unless you don't mind the constant beeping over and over, you are better off just vacuuming yourself. I wanted to wait and see if it would get any better over rugs. Unfortunately not. I've had this for 60 days and it's paperweight. Bought an Oreck vacuum and it actually vacuums and removes particles off of rugs and floors. Really wanted to give this auto vacuum a try and it has failed miserably. This is good for days that you have cleaned and swept and you use this for very light use. Suction is extremely poor, instead of collecting small debris, it spins the debris out of it's way.
customer_reviews.author: Raffi T.

customer_reviews.title: Four Beep Error Solved!
customer_reviews.text: After a year of use I started to get the dreaded "four beep" error. After trying every fix I could think of, it dawned on me that it might be the battery. I found a replacement battery (not Eufy OEM) here on Amazon, that solved the beeps and got my Eufy running again. Yay! Long term review: handy, but not super-powerful. It doesn't get into corners as efficiently as it should. It works best if you cordon it off into a room and let it work alone for 15 minutes. For the price it's a good value; certainly better than having to vacuum yourself, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: worldlyone

customer_reviews.title: Should have done it long ago
customer_reviews.text: Oh well, I wouldn't have done it long ago because they were expensive. When I saw the price and the reviews, I decided to try it out. So far I think it is great, able to go from floor to carpet, not falling off stairs, picks up A LOT of dirt! I didn't know we had so much dust in our house!!! The only thing that I am not too happy about is the mapping/memory. It does not seem to really retain the landscape because it takes forever for it to get home (always had to help) when I push the home button (seem to get lost). Otherwise, I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: MC SJC

customer_reviews.title: and it does a great job picking up cat hair
customer_reviews.text: This robo vacuum definitely gets the job done for the fraction of the price of other brands. My only qualm is that it sometimes gets stuck under things, which is something I'm willing to deal with for the price range of this product. I use it on hardwood floors and it has no problem going over any of my rugs or over thresholds into other rooms. I also have two cats who shed a lot, and it does a great job picking up cat hair. This is honestly one of the best purchases I have ever made in my entire life.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Boissy

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for almost a year when it stopped turning on. Eufy support sent us a replacement (refurbished) without question, but that one didn't work either. Service dept was great, said to send it back and they sent us another brand new one. All within a week-- I was really impressed with their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn A Miriani

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in 2017. Ran it every other day. Quiet and picked up dog hair. Today one of the side brushes stopped working so the whole thing won't work. Looked all over internet, doesn't seem to be any fixes out there. Not sure what life expectancy of these robovacs should be but we expected to get more than 2 years out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Short-term review: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: 1 week in, and the Eufy is amazing. Bought after the fantastic review on SweetHome, and has not disappointed. We vacuumed our entire house with our traditional vacuum cleaner, and then let the Eufy do its thing every day. For pet owners - this thing is a must-have! We are having to empty the collection bin every day, but our floors have never been so consistently clean.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is wonderful, seriously does a great job and on it's ...
customer_reviews.text: AwEsOmEnEsS. I have pets and kids and live downwind and can't seem to keep up on the dirt and dust sometimes until now! This vacuum is wonderful, seriously does a great job and on it's own lol.... I walked around barefoot and it felt really clean!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
customer_reviews.text: We named ours Mrs. Doubtfire. (Eufy, get it???) She does a great job. We have 3 cats & 2 dogs. only hard surfaces for our floors. We do need to clean out her filter & catch (bin?) because of the amount of dog dust bunnies & cat dust bunnies we accumulate, but she still works great! We've had her almost a year, and just now ordered new replacement brushes & filters.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled at the Eufy RoboVac's performance!
customer_reviews.text: So surprised how little my cats were disturbed by it after the initial shock of seeing a little robot traveling the length of the house. Thrilled at how well it works on both carpet and hard floors, no trouble moving between the surfaces unlike the failing performance of my previous stand-up vacuum. The dirt cup filled up so fast, makes me wonder how little the other vacuum picked up in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Tiggershadow

customer_reviews.title: Extremelly Ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Very ineffective. I have stained concrete floors and cowhide area rugs. It will not go over the cowhide and gets stuck. If just keeps running and trying to go over the cowhide. It really surprised me that it would not be more effective, I really thought it being low nap it would work. However, it won't even go on the throw rugs in the kitchen. It is permanently housed in the corner of the dining room. I would NEVER recommend it. Unfortunately, you only have a 30 day opportunity to return it and if you have anything happen during that time that will not allow you to try it out you are screwed, the company makes no exceptions.
customer_reviews.author: Bennybaby

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating.
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 2nd one in about 6 months. The first one's side brush stopped spinning after 2 months, but they replaced the unit. Now this one, which started out fine, has resorted to slamming in to everything that comes in its path at full speed or getting stuck on or under pretty much every piece of furniture I own every five minutes. I hate this thing, honestly, it's just easier to use the old upright hoover we have.
customer_reviews.author: DB Harp

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been pleasantly surprised with this little guy. Pros: - It runs very quiet (compared to my previous Roomba) - Great price - It picks up a TON of dirt - Navigates around the room nicely - Did I say it was quiet? Cons: - Wish it could 'sense' a little better of where it's base is. Sometimes dies and can't get back to base in time (mostly due to my house layout) - Wish it was wifi connected to activate it via an app or Google Home / Amazon Echo - Wish it had fences for certain doorways
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Salewski

customer_reviews.title: Just make sure it is turned on...
customer_reviews.text: Eugene has been in our life since Mother's Day, so imagine my surprise and sadness when it stopped working after a short break while a crawling baby was in the house. Popped Eugene back on and he refused to do his duty. Enter Ashley at customer service. She helped out like an IT professional: "Did you turn it on?" and dangit, we accidentally pushed the off switch when we removed it from the rampaging baby. He's now back to doing what he does best: catching all our ridiculous pet hair in epic proportions. Thanks to eufy and Eugene!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations !!!!!!'
customer_reviews.text: I had been on the fence about getting a robovac. A friend raved about her Eufy. So I went for it and am so glad I did. With living in AZ and having a dog that sheds, keeping the laminate floors clean required sweeping and dusting at least every other day. What amazes me is that the Eufy cleans even better than my manual effort. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Hate It, I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am impressed at how well this vacuum works. Two Great Danes and a Pomeranian can leave behind quite a bit of hairy mess, but with this awesome robot the everyday dog hair and dust quickly disappear. The dogs absolutely hate it and bark at it, but I love it. It has no problem going from hardwood to carpet and it even traverses our shaggier rug, which I thought it would not be able to handle. So far it is great about getting itself out of tight corners. I am also impressed by how quiet this vacuum is. I wish I hadn’t waited so long to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a cheap backup, but quickly became my primary robo vac!
customer_reviews.text: I got a Eufy to complement my Neato XV-11, and boy, am I impressed! It ended up replacing my Neato – something I wasn't expecting out of such a reasonably priced vacuum. I use the Eufy in the basement (dark tile floor) and it works great. It’s much quieter than the Neato, it has a lithium ion battery, and includes a remote. I’ve had a Roomba in the past and was not impressed (especially for the price). I'm excited to see what new features future versions of the Eufy will include. Every time a friend or relative tells me they bought a Roomba (because of the marketing), I cringe and tell them they should have gone with Eufy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Eufy RoboVac 11 last year to use in between classes at my dog training center. It is so nice to not have to spend my free time between classes and private lessons vacuuming the floor! This product works great on my rubber flooring to pick up dog hair, dirt and treat crumbs. Recently the vacuum stopped working, so I called the company. I worked with Kevin, who had a replacement sent to me within a short, easy 5 minute phone call. Very happy with the product and the customer service! Update after 2 years the Robovac 11 is no longer working. Hopefully they have improved the product to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsie Bernier

customer_reviews.title: carpets and room transitions easily. I've been running this for 2 week daily ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I waited so long to buy this gem. I have 2 dogs, one is a long haired shedder. I do have to clean the brushes after each run, but I have to do the same with the large vacuum. The Eufy is much more patient about getting against baseboards and corners than I am. It handles hardwood, carpets and room transitions easily. I've been running this for 2 week daily and so far I am very proud of myself for the smart purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene F.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job at a Great $
customer_reviews.text: Good little remote vacuum, picked it up prime day with an additional discount code. Can be set to auto-run at a pre-demined time each day and a remote to guide or change some settings, no advanced programming to customize a specific pattern, Does have a perimeter setting -good for going along the baseboards, runs on its own a does a great job on tile and wood floors, I have two dogs and run my Eufy every morning -it helps augment the floor cleaning between the weekend house deeper house cleaning. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Eufy makes a great RoboVac and stands by their products!
customer_reviews.text: Eufy has found a great balance of affordable luxury with the RoboVac 11. It's a downright great product for the price. I still can't believe the amount of dust and grime this thing finds on my floors and collects in it's dust bin. A company's true colors show when there's an issue, and I can confidently say Eufy stands behind their products. One quick call to support, which was answered quickly by Adam, a friendly and knowledgable support rep, and a replacement unit was on it's way. I couldn't ask for anything more, these little RoboVacs are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Plevinsky

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product, It does a great job of cleaning ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, It does a great job of cleaning hardwood floors but not so sure about the area rugs. It was not moving properly on the rug in my family room so I had to clean it using my upright vacuum cleaner. However this is a great product for those hard to reach areas like under the bed and behind couches. When I opened it to empty the dust container, I was amazed at how much dust it had collected from under each bed. Now my hard wood floors are sparkling clean.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sen

customer_reviews.title: 2 years of very light use and it doesn't pick up dust or clean carpet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2017 and have used it very lightly to clean a 1 bedroom apartment (~675 square feet). At first it worked well, but after 3 months or so, it picked up less and less dust, hair, and dirt off the floor. I stopped using it after I moved to another apartment that's similar in size. I recently took it out and tried to use it again, but it does not work at all. It doesn't pick up any dirt or dust on hardwood floor or carpet, even after I cleaned out the roller brush.
customer_reviews.author: student

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect seriously
customer_reviews.text: I read so many reviews before deciding on this one. I am so glad I took the time! This thing is a life saver. I never sweep anymore! I’m not gonna go into huge detail because there are already so many good reviews. But the smartness, mobility, EVERYTHING about it is just perfect. It gets all the corners and doesn’t just stay in one spot it gets the whole house. Make sure there are no socks lying around when using. Make sure if you have dogs that go potty in the house sometimes to never use it around them. I turn it on when the dogs are in my site or in my bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Died on second day, but fabulous customer service!
customer_reviews.text: It spins in a tight circle. Tried cleaning all sensors, clearing bumper and wheels, but it won’t do anything but spin in a circle and then flash it’s red light and beep twice, indicating a bumper problem, but the bumper is clear with no obstruction. Sending it back for a refund. Very disappointed. It worked fine the first day, though did get stuck a couple times. UPDATE: this company has fabulous customer service. They were very responsive and worked with me for a satisfactory return. Because this product worked well the first day I would recommend trying it because there’s nothing to lose... the company will work with you if there are any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: This robot is the best thing I could have done for myself
customer_reviews.text: This robot is the best thing I could have done for myself. We named him R2D2 and with him running every day, it was almost like I didn't have dogs at all. Unfortunately, R2D2 passed away after only 10 months. The Eufy team was kind enough to replace him free of charge, so now we have BB8. BB8 is just as good, if not better, as R2D2. I love Eufy, and am now a life long customer.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Works great and top notch customer service
customer_reviews.text: We had this vacuum for a year now. Have run it everyday! Keeps the floors clean between cleaning days. I’m very impressed with how well it works and how little maintenance there is. Just set the scheduler and let it go. Empty the bin every other day or so. Customer support is excellent too! Kevin was very helpful when we had trouble with the unit and they replaced it with no hassle. They stand behind their products. So nice to find a company with good customer service, something that seems to be harder and harder to find these days. Very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kloepfer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch customer support
customer_reviews.text: We let it run almost everytime we leave the house. It does a great job at picking up everything including dog hair. After about nine months, it started running in a tight circle only. We cleaned the bumper and went through the troubleshooting tips before contacting customer support. They requested a short video to see what it was doing. They immediately sent me a refurbished unit (they'll send a new if it's been less than 6 months). They we're friendly and helpful through the whole process. It was definitely nice to know they back their product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: reppster

customer_reviews.title: ... was a bit skeptical that a machine for this awesome price would do everything promised
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit I was a bit skeptical that a machine for this awesome price would do everything promised. I figured if it even worked semi-decent there would still be less dog hair on the floor. This little machine ROCKS! He picks up every strand of dog hair and finds a handful of dust daily!! If you're hesitating about performance, you don't need to be, works great. I have an all hardwood floor house and works amazingly well. I've only had for four months so can't comment on durability, but zero issues so far. It is a dream to turn him on as I walk out the door to work and come home to spotless floor. Hello Jetsons!
customer_reviews.author: AES77377

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have for any dog owner
customer_reviews.text: Totally obsessed with this vacuum! We have a golden retriever and needed something to help combat the endless dog hair. The Eufy is seriously life changing. First, the price point is fantastic. Second, it works great!! Third, kids love it! We turn it on and let it go. Every once in a while it gets stuck under an end table, but basically it does its thing and goes back to its home when the battery is low. I love that it can clean under all my beds as that’s usually a really hard area to get after. This vacuum has exceeded my expectations in the 2 months we’ve had it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Collins

customer_reviews.title: Robot
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product it cleans tile and low carpet as described. I liked it so much I ordered 2 more at a cheaper price from walmart I was very unhappy at the cleaning or should I say the lack of cleaning. The part name was the same from ec technology as that is advertised on amazon. I can assure it is not the same it will not clean as they described and the dirt collector is much different. I am in the process of trying to return to walmart and that is a daunting task at best since ec technology needs to send a return label. Still waiting to hear from ec technology.
customer_reviews.author: red head

customer_reviews.title: The new one we received worked better than our first ever did
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 border collies and 3 children and a large kitchen. We bought Eufy just to clean the kitchen and it does exactly that. We did have an issue with our first one after 6 months but I contacted the company and it was replaced without hassle. The new one we received worked better than our first ever did. If we were using it on carpet regularly I think my review would be different. It doesn’t work as well on carpet and gets stuck more. It does great going over the multiple rugs in our kitchen though.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Really, really good for its price.
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky enough to snatch it when it was on sale for $150. It has high suction power, very incredible ease of use, and it does the vacuuming job pretty well. The only thing that I was mildly disappointed in was that it seems to have no definite cleaning pattern like some of the more advanced irobot roomba and no phone app to control it when I'm away from home. But since I bought it for a fraction of a price and it does its job really well otherwise, I have really no solid complaints about this. Hopefully one day this can include those and maybe even mopping functions. Also, it's adorable and I've adopted it as my pet.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Wanted another robotic sweeper and read the reviews and liked the price of the Eufy
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered for years with both indoor and outdoor allergens. We have had a Roomba in the past, but it was always stopping for no reason. Wasn't worth the money we had spent. Wanted another robotic sweeper and read the reviews and liked the price of the Eufy, so ordered on and absolutely love this thing. We have all hardwood floors and keep our home clean, but somehow "Hazel" manages to find tons of dust. The specs state it runs up to 2 hours per use, but we just stopped ourselves at 2 hours and twenty minutes. I seldom write reviews but this is wonderful. Don't believe you can go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V. Quallen

customer_reviews.title: This little sucker works great!! I bought it mainly for my wife ...
customer_reviews.text: This little sucker works great!! I bought it mainly for my wife so she wouldn’t have to sweep our hard floors so often. We have pets. She “poo poo’d“ the vacuum at first. Once I had ran it a few times and she saw that it’ll go across our area rugs, under the beds and furniture too, she took notice. Then she saw all the pet hair and took interest and wanted to know how to run it. Once she figured that out, which is easy, she started moving it from room to room and now loves it! She thank me for getting it a few times now. It’s a real good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: dave porter

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a month now it won't stay charged after charging all night. They sent me a new one. It was used and dirty. They didn't send a charger with it. The one they sent is worse than the one I first got. After charging for 12 hours it won't get of the charger. It says it's charged and when I go to use it it says it needs to charge. I'm waiting for them to send another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eufy Rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to buy this little Robovac because we have a LOT of dog hair. With our four dogs and our daughter’s two visiting...you can imagine! I was afraid it wouldn’t work well and would end up being just one more appliance stored in my garage. I’m so glad I took the chance. This little bot does a great job of keeping the hair down. It runs for a long time on a charge and has a good size dust bin. If I vacuum weekly, Eufy can keep the floors pretty clean until its time to deep clean again. I highly recommend it. I intend to buy a couple more for Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life, Eufy?
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite purchases ever! I've always wanted a robot vacuum but couldn't pull the trigger on the models that cost four and five hundred dollars. So when I saw a review by a New York Times product tester who said this was a good basic robot vacuum and the price was half of the more expensive brands, I went for it. I couldn't be happier. It does a solid job, has the basic features I want, and I like that it has a HEPA filter. It's hard to believe how much dust, hair, and dirt this thing sucks up every time I run it.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service on the Eufy website was excellent and the chat makes asking questions so easy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Eufy for 1 year now and I absolutely love it! Today was the first day I actually had issues with it, and I went to the Eufy website and chatted with Christian and explained the problem to him, while we were trouble shooting, I noticed for the first time that on the bottom of the Eufy itself, it explains what the beeps mean and the red or blue light if it is flashing and beeping. I was able to fix the problem while Christian was on the chat with me! I just loved this vacuum!!!
customer_reviews.author: Triciatx

customer_reviews.title: By far one of my best purchases ever
customer_reviews.text: By far one of my best purchases ever, I have a dog and just could not keep up with the hair before, now I schedule it to run once a day while I'm at work and the hair issue is basically gone! Under 200 dollars is a hell of a bargain, although it does not have the features of the fancier models you have the ability to control it with the included remote, you can schedule cleaning times and cleaning modes, frankly that is all I need, If I was to upgrade I would absolutely get a WiFi enabled model but for the money you absolutely cannot beat this. Roomba? Pfft
customer_reviews.author: Kliverance

customer_reviews.title: Great product with reliable warranty
customer_reviews.text: I love my robo vac! Unfortunately after 10 months of use, something happened that caused it to just spin in circles. I called in to customer service & spoke to John. After some troubleshooting that unfortunately didn’t fix the problem, they are sending me a brand new unit. Thanks for providing a great product & excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Balmer

customer_reviews.title: Returning this one
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back. I had a Roomba before this, and it honestly did a better job. It didn't get stuck nearly as often, it cleaned the floors better, and it could properly dock itself. This one required me to get up every ten minutes because it would lodge itself under the fridge or get stuck under a chair. It required more supervision than it was worth. The one pro point is that it didn't seem to choke on pet hair (I have two Shelties and two cats) but then again, I only had it 2 weeks. The Roomba did just fine the first year I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: we’re happy. After 2 months of trying we still love ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, we’re happy. After 2 months of trying we still love it. Had to replace one of our thick shag area rugs for a thinner one but we had be wanting to anyways. Otherwise, it gets stuck on thick piling. He does manage to get over pretty high doorway approaches. He will try and try again until he masters it! It’s insane how much dust/junk this thing picks up! You will wonder where it all comes from & how you lived before this! I do wish it had the feature to know (like others do) to avoid certain areas like a rug but again, for the price it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eufy is an amazing addition to cleaning!!
customer_reviews.text: Eufy is perfect!! Super easy to manage, very quiet, and the remote is user friendly and has its own storage on the base which is nice. I hit Auto on the remote and ‘she’ covers the entire house. If the battery runs low, ‘she’ will begin to make her way back to the base to recharge...Brilliant!!! You can also hit the house icon on the remote and Eufy will return back to base. Another good feature is if ‘she’ gets stuck in a tight space-you will hear continuous slow beep to let you know, help is needed. I believe you will enjoy Eufy as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t go under many things so we still need ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t go under many things so we still need a vacuum with a hose but it picks up quite a bit of stuff and battery life is long Edited 11/9/17: This product is AMAZING!!! Now only if they had one that mopped!! Customer service reached out about the above problem and was awesome too. It was user error. It is seriously perfect. We Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Fear

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Worked great and quiet
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing. I just had wood floors put down and they had to demolish ceramic tile and pull up carpet. It was such a mess. We pulled her out of the box and once charged, let her go. It took a little while and she started finding a pattern as she was learning the layout. When the charge was running out, she found her way back to the charging station. We couldn't believe how much dust she picked up. Easy to use, easy to clean and very quiet. In fact, I had to walk around the house at one time to see what room she was in.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Revised Rating - Extreme Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The 5 stars are for customer service - awesome!!! Unfortunately I had to return my Eufy because it's not suitable for a long haired dog - but the company contacted me - offered one-on-one trouble shooting assistance - even offered to handle the return but I had already processed the return thru Amazon. So while this particular item didn't work for me - I will be on the lookout for any other products from this company because their customer service is outstanding!!! I still highly recommend this product to anyone with a short-haired dog - the suction and overall cleaning action is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: B. Alfred

customer_reviews.title: Unit stopped working after 18 mo of use.  Can not be repaired.
customer_reviews.text: This unit worked ok. We were happy with how it cleaned dog hair from hardwood floors. However unit stopped working due to a bad corner brush motor. As a result of this one motor not working the unit no longer functions. Reviewed situation with manufacturer and can offer nothing but a 10% discount on a new unit. We will not be buying another euphy. We are very disappointed with the manufacturer not "standing behind their product". They can,t or won't offer a replacement motor. What a joke. We don't want to spend over $200 every 18 months for a new robot vacuum. We do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S

customer_reviews.title: Nicknamed Crabby
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, even though I buy a LOT of things on Amazon. My wife and I were married in May and bought this with some of our wedding money. I thought it was going to be used a few time and then get stuck in the closet...WRONG. This vacuum is bad ass! It gets all the sand, dirt, and dog hair off our floors. It's entertaining as hell to watch and it's two spinning side brushes look like a sand crab eating. I swept with a broom the other day and this thing still picks up even more! Love It! Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Chase J.

customer_reviews.title: but it tackled those easily. There is one spot where it gets confused- ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed! I have a mix of hardwoods, area rugs of varied piles and vinyl flooring. I was a bit skeptical about being able to go over the wooden transitions strips, but it tackled those easily. There is one spot where it gets confused- it was an area rug with black swirls in it. (Thinking of replacing rug anyway). Other than that it’s extrememly refreshing to come home to a freshly vacuumed house each day. Remember to empty the bin and wipe off the sensors each day and you’re good to go. Clean the mesh filter once a week. I’m so happy it gets underneath the furniture. I don’t own any pets to worry about fur problems.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Better than our Roomba
customer_reviews.text: The Eufy and the Roomba pickup comparable amounts of dirt, but the Eufy is quieter, easier to clean, lower (gets in more places), and less than half the price. The hepa filter is also a big plus since it keeps the fine particulates from being reintroduced into the air.
customer_reviews.author: MikeS

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend so far...
customer_reviews.text: Have had it approx 1 wk and used it nearly every day. Is effective, it takes a full battery cycle to clean a single room (2 hrs 15 mins until it needs to recharge). Worked on laminateasley and low pile carpet. Did ok on medium pile carpet but did get stuck a few times in the space between the carpet, the flat floor, and the edge of our couch. Remote is simple to use, it finds its base well. Filter abd dust bij are easy to clean out. Sure pleased so far! Seller was wonderful, quick, and great product. Highly recommend this seller as well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L

customer_reviews.title: It does an amazing job vacuuming up the dirt the kids bring in
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum has changed my life. It does an amazing job vacuuming up the dirt the kids bring in, the pet hair, and things of everyday life that manage to fall to the floor. I have literally come to rely on it. At one point I had an issue where is started spinning in circles, but I called customer service and spoke with Kevin, and they sent me a replacement vacuum without any hassle. I am beyond satisfied with both the vacuum and the customer service, and I couldn't recommend it highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt find home station, gets stuck, doesnt clean a room thoroughly
customer_reviews.text: He can be handy but only if you look him in a room because he doesnt clean systematically. He will zig zag through the hall, make a few passes in a room and go to the next. He NEVER finds his "home." So, when i need him i have to go looking for him then he is usually dead. He gets stuck on everything, including nothing in the middle of the living room.... He does get pet hair up well. If he found his home station & cleaned in a better manner I would like him. The customer service is awesome though and they will make sure that you are happy!
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little vacuum. It is easy to charge, use, empty and clean. It works surprisingly well. It does a great job picking up dirt; even on carpets. However it does have some flaws. It has difficulty dealing with thick carpets. It bumps them as though hitting an obstacle and will not climb onto it to clean (thin / medium carpets are not an issue). Also in enclosed spaces (like a bedroom) it is terrific. In larger open areas it does not quite work as well in that it's path seems pretty random so it may miss some spots.
customer_reviews.author: roger s

customer_reviews.title: I had others, this one is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the top competing brand before so I understand what this should and should not be doing. This is great: very quite, has actual suction instead of just a "tray" that collects dirt. When it is done sweeping my carpets are soft and the nap is set at an equal length all over so I feels soft to my bare feet. This sweeps up that layer of dust that seems to be permanent on my kitchen tile. I like the hepa filtering. I am considering getting a cat to see if this one is quiet enough for my cat to ride on. I love those youTube videos, don't you?
customer_reviews.author: D. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Honest Review: Comparable performance to manual vacuuming on carpets and better than the same price range Roomba
customer_reviews.text: Strongly recommend this over the comparable model from Roomba. It cleans great and navigates smarter, in addition to having better battery life. I have been using this on plush carpeted floors and the floors feels and looks very clean, picking up a ton of dust. It can pick up larger debris as well. Its low profile makes its capable of getting under most furniture. The RoboVac is also very quiet, making less noise than a dishwasher, and is not too bothersome to run even when you are at home.
customer_reviews.author: crimsoncat

customer_reviews.title: Great robot vac. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I love my robot vac, Eufy! I've had since December 2017 and battery just quit. She's freakin awesome. It helps keep dog hair picked up between cleanings. And customer service is amazing. Anytime I've had to troubleshoot something I send them a video like this and they tell me what is wrong. It has a one year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Jean

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I've got all tile and hardwood floors. Even running it daily, you still have to empty the catch. It's easy enough though. It just continues to find dust bunnies and whatever else. I keep this under my couch and visitors have no idea it's there. The 11 goes for about 90 minutes before needing to go back to it's base to charge. If you have it programmed, it will need to run daily. I would rather it run every other day, so I just kick it off when I head to work in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: Tireless Trooper
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was a good housekeeper until this creature entered my life. I'm stupefied over the amount of dirt it picks up again and again. I'm beginning to suspect it manufactures it on it's own! It does take a bit of trial and error discovering which cords, doormats, and other obstacles to hide but you learn it quickly. My only apprehension is over the lifespan of the rechargeable battery; there is no way to predict that
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ruhland

customer_reviews.title: Still deciding.
customer_reviews.text: We're still deciding about this product. I got my parents one to replace their Neato. Cons: you can't program the times it cleans (your whole week in advance), they don't mind. It does not have a pattern for cleaning a room, it just wandering about willy nilly. And last, Mom set it for a certain time one day and now it goes off every day wherever it wants--not the same time, it's weird, but again they don't care. Pros: it picks up a ton of dirt. It has a lower profile than their Neato so gets under their coffee table. They seem happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: seattlegal64

customer_reviews.title: Help on this problem
customer_reviews.text: I have a question/problem. Is it only mine that after pushing AUTO button, it starts (with a slow motion), rotates 180 degrees and goes backward hitting the charging station and after that starts going forward but for a short distance, and rotates again back to the charging station.... then after pushing AUTO button again, it starts working normally. Did anyone have this problem? Or mine came with defects? Otherwise it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: **bought a new plug and got 3 more months out of it. Now it flashes like it’s charging, but won’t turn on or run at all. Light just flashes blue. Replaced the battery, cleaned all the parts, still nothing. Such a disappointment. Had 6 months, does better with small sectioned off spaces. Battery died. Used once a week on kitchen floor so not a lot of use. Would t charge in the charging port from the first week, so I used the plug. Now it won’t even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 dogs that shed and track in dirt. I have hardwood floors and live in a 600 sq ft place. This vacuum has saved my sanity. It picks up SO MUCH dirt and hair that I would miss vacuuming myself. It's easy to use and clean. It does its job extremely well. I do make sure to pick things up off the floor and move wires out of the way, because sometimes the vacuum will get caught or eat the occasional sock laying on the floor (the suction is unreal), but it's the least I can do for all that my Eufy does for me! I tell everyone how much I love it.
customer_reviews.author: tori

customer_reviews.title: I love my Eufy!
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable and effective floor sweeper. Will shut off and start beeping if it sucks up something bad for it. Sometimes it gets stuck under chairs or uneven flooring and beeps for help. Much better on hardwood, pergola, linoleum or tile than on carpet. The laser sensor keeps it from falling down stairs. It will turn around. Also, it will return to its charger when it's done!
customer_reviews.author: A. Standiford

customer_reviews.title: Overall good, but problems...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Eufy RoboVac 11 and it works pretty well. Good suction and got rid of more dirt than my normal vacuum. The only reason I am leaving 3 stars is because it will randomly get stuck in the middle of the floor at random intervals. It is infuriating. UPDATE: Eufy was amazingly helpful, they were quick to send me a replacement after the troubleshooting attempts failed. Would highly recommend even though my first one was an outlier. UPDATE 2: My replacement RoboVac now will not hold a charge. I let it charge over night and will not even roll off the charging doc before dying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: It'll be a few weeks before a real review can be made but so far I am very happy. I've run it twice it's filled the bin with dog hair and dirt both times. The edge finding isn't perfect but it's adequate and the room cleaning seems fairly random but gets the job done. For the price, this far exceeded what I was expecting in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre at best
customer_reviews.text: Best for hard floors and light dust. Just about useless for anything else. Weak pull on carpets, can't find it's way home even if you lock it in the same room with the docking station. Gets stuck under just about everything. It does make for an enjoyable scavenger hunt when you get home. It will lengthen the time between manual vacuumes if you don't have any carpets or rugs. We have owned it for about 10 months, and it now has about 7 months worth of dust on it.
customer_reviews.author: Surfdiver

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: As a whole I love it! There's so much more stuff on my floors then I never knew existed. I run this every other day and it picks up a full tray of garbage. I have two cats and most of it is just for her. The only thing is that it does need a lot of babysitting. It seems to love going underneath my dining room table and getting stuck between the chairs. In fact it makes a beeline for that area soon as I turned it on. I guess the other thing I don't know is how long The machine will actually last – Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: Holds a LOT of fur.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 2 Roombas and 1 Neato - main problems were the vac bin getting full, the beater bar hard to clean, and the battery dying after 2 years. I have 2 very furry ragdoll cats and a hairy golden retriever. Hair is no longer a problem. Eufy has the largest bin of any of its competitors and the brushes are easier to clean. So far it's been running great. From reading the reviews I see that there are replacement batteries available when needed in a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: E. L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: A must buy !
customer_reviews.text: Ah maze ing !!!!! I have a Great Pyrenees who sheds nonstop. I finally wised up and decided to get this vacuum . It's the best thing since sliced bread . My floors have never been cleaner ! I have hardwoods with low pile area rugs . The best part is under my bed .... it's spotless . Husband has allergies so this is also an investment in our health as well. I didn't want to spend tons of money on another vacuum (I have 2 dysons ) the roomba is $$ . The Eufy is priced right and does a fantastic job ! Just make sure to get all cords off the floor or they will get sucked in.
customer_reviews.author: Julie L

customer_reviews.title: Love my Eufy!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Eufy robot vac for quite a while now and I can still say that I love it! It is a little dim if I am being honest. It gets caught under the refrigerator A LOT and gets hung up on certain area rugs that are the exact same height as others that give it no issues but it still does a great job of cleaning without someone having to physically push a vacuum around the entire house. We have found we cannot just set it and leave the house for the above mentioned reasons, but, when someone is around to "rescue" her, Eufy does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Reed Arthur Lindner

customer_reviews.title: It's great when it works
customer_reviews.text: It's great when it works. I'm on my second Robo Vac in four months. The first one stopped sensing obstacles, and crashed full speed into walls and furniture. I contacted customer service, and they sent a new one. I packed the broken unit into the same package and sent it back to the manufacturer using a pre-paid postage label. The second one worked for a week before the same thing happened - it quit sensing obstacles and rams into them forcefully. Now, it just sits in one place and spins around until the battery runs out. I'll give Eufy one more chance before I ask for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: R Crane

customer_reviews.title: Great for apartments with pets who shed.
customer_reviews.text: Time saver. We have two pets (cat and dog). Between them you can probably find a thick handful of loose fur daily. The Eufy has solved this problem in spades. We have dark wood laminate flooring and on most days you can see furstacks rooming all over the place. The Eufy does a great job and wrangling all those suckers down. We don't have much carpet but the bathroom has typical bathroom carpets and it tends to get stuck on those so we just keep the door closed. It is pretty quiet and we auto set it to go on the same time everyday while away. Make sure to keep cords off the ground!
customer_reviews.author: BananaHaus

customer_reviews.title: I overdrew my bank account, no regrets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and forgot the car insurance was due. So I have been scraping coins together to get through until payday. No regrets - this thing is awesome. It cleans well, better than my manual vacuum ever did even when combined with a rug rake, and I do other stuff while it's working. The kids love it. The cat fears it. I have used it every day since it arrived. Buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died after a year!
customer_reviews.text: For the first year it worked just fine! Did it’s work and saved me some time. It has stopped working when entering the second year. N most importantly we didn’t use it often. I couldn’t figure out what us the issue! I put it aside and forgot about it until recently I took this video shows the problem. Is someone could answer my question! TIA
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Picks up all of my husky's hair (which is a lot this time of year). Only drawback so far is that it gets stuck under my fridge. I have all hardwood floors and the Robovac does pretty well with other obstacles. But with my fridge, it will get under the shallow lip and then get stuck in the corner formed by the fridge and wall. I caught it in the act today and it was just in that corner trying to move forward and not trying to back out. Pretty annoying. Photo and video attached.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bergstrand

customer_reviews.title: Short Life-Span
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum worked great for the first year. Great for keeping down the general amount of dust and hair on the floor. However, after about a year, the navigation and battery-life began to deteriorate. At first the robot would almost never run into furniture, but would slow to a stop before changing directions. Now, it hits everything at full speed before bouncing away. Battery life is down to about 30-40 minutes and it is no longer able to find its docking station. The initial performance of this product, especially considering the price, easily gets 4.5-5 stars. But a 1-1.5 year period of usefulness makes this a borderline disposable product, so I have to reduce its rating.
customer_reviews.author: Joe O.

product_meta.title: eufy RoboVac 11, High Suction, Self-Charging Robotic Vacuum Cleaner with Drop-Sensing Technology and High-Performance Filter for Pet, Designed for Hard Floor and Thin Carpet
feature_bullets: Cleans For You: Clean your house with the click of a button. Versatile cleaning modes and the low-profile design facilitates cleaning under tables and chairs along with every nook and cranny.
High-Capacity Li-ion Battery: Delivers strong suction power for up to 1.5 hours.
3-Point Cleaning System: Side brushes, a rolling brush and powerful suction ensure a thorough clean.
Premium Features: Anti-scratch tempered glass cover for protection, infrared-sensor for evading obstacles, and drop-sensing tech to avoid falls. Recharges automatically.
